Repository Name Unauthorized: Butler County Historical and Genealogical Society, Inc.
Notes: The Butler County Historical and Genealogical Society collection contains news clippings, obituaries, pedigree charts, bible records, family letters and photos, queries, cemetery records, census and military records, genealogies, biographies and county histories, and thousands of other research items.  They house their collection at the Greenville-Butler County Public Library.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
